main event: A civilian observed a brilliant orange light in the southeastern sky that appeared and disappeared several times on March 25, 1966.
interesting points: The observer initially noticed the light while driving on California Highway No. 1.,The light maneuvered in the sky and seemed to disappear for periods of time., A contrail was observed which did not appear typical of regular aircraft landing lights., The brightness of the light was compared to that of aircraft landing lights, suggesting it was very bright., No sound was heard during the entire observation period.
